Drains Damp-Heat especially from the Lower Jiao, drains Kidney Fire and relieves Fire toxicity.
With Mu Xiang, for acute diarrhea and abdominal pain.
Clears Heat, resolves toxicity, expels pus, reduces abscesses, dispels Blood Stasis and stops pain.
With Chi Shao, for unsuppurated Intestinal abscess with an immobile abdominal mass.
Reduces abscesses, dissipates nodules, clears the Liver, clears Heat, resolves Dampness and unblocks painful urinary dysfunction.
With Bai Jiang Cao, disperses Stagnation due to Heat Toxin with abdominal pain and distention, abdominal masses, and jaundice.
Invigorates the Blood, circulates Qi, stops pain and induces and prolongs sleep.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis,reduces swelling from sores and abscesses and relieves pain.
Clears Heat, cools and harmonizes the Blood, clears Deficiency Fire, invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, drains pus and reduces swelling.
With Chi Shao, cools the Blood and disperses Stasis, for Blood Stasis disorders.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, reduces swelling and promotes the discharge of pus.
With Wang Bu Liu Xing, for mobile and fixed abdominal masses and accumulations.
Draws out toxicity, discharges pus, invigorates the Blood and reduces swelling.
Promotes the movement of Qi, adjusts and regulates stagnant Qi in the Intestines, strengthens the Spleen, prevents Stagnation, dispels Damp-Heat, harmonizes the Liver and Spleen and alleviates pain.
Tonifies the Spleen and augments Qi and moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.

symptoms: Recurrent bouts of urinary pain, frequency and urgency
Pain in the genitals radiating to the groin, lower abdomen and perineum
Possible constipation or dry stools or, rarely, uneasy defecation of loose stools with a burning sensation in the anus
Effort to defecate causing a milky white, turbid discharge from the urethra
Possible Dryness, bitterness or sliminess in the mouth\
manifestations.pulse: Slippery, wiry and rapid or Soggy and rapid

nausea and Stomach and abdominal distention
